meanings.definition: The state of feeling sick to one's stomach.
meanings.sent1: Her nauseousnesses made her unable to eat breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The nauseousnesses from the roller coaster ride lingered for hours.
meanings.sent3: The thought of eating broccoli filled him with nauseousnesses.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the decaying food in the fridge was a wave of nauseousnesses.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the garbage can brought a sudden wave of nauseousnesses.

meanings.definition: The quality of causing a feeling of sickness or disgust.
meanings.sent1: The nauseousnesses of the spoiled milk was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: The nauseousnesses of the horror movie left her trembling.
meanings.sent3: The nauseousnesses of the slimy texture made her shiver.
meanings.sent4: The nauseousnesses of the rotting fruit filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The nauseousnesses of the foul odor made her gag.
